recode:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
recode:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

recode:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
recode:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
recode:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

recode:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
recode:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

recode:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
recode:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !recode:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

recode:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
recode:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !recode:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
